description: The two countries, at loggerheads over oil and gas finds, announce manoeuvres for Tuesday off Crete.
title: Turkey-Greece rival military exercises due as oil tensions rise
title_page: Turkey-Greece rival military exercises due as oil tensions rise - BBC News
maintext: Relations between Turkey and Greece have deteriorated several times in the past few decades in a festering dispute over islands in the Aegean. On three occasions tensions have escalated close to the point of conflict.
